name: Cover Letter & Resumes for Notion
description: A collection of cover letter/resume designs. There are 4 resume designs to choose from.The cover letter is a simple and elegant design with the page title for the applicants name, a sub-header for position title, a contact section at the top, and an example letter in the page body.Inside the cover letter is a link to a resume template. Included in each resume is a link back to the cover letter, a contact section, bulleted skills & abilities, a skills database list with progress bar designs t
